# formIndex(after:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the given index with its successor.

## Declaration

```swift
func formIndex(after i: inout LazyFilterSequence<Base>.Index)
```

## Parameters

- **i**: A valid index of the collection. `i` must be less than `endIndex`.
title: formIndex(after:)
